mapper.sql: DETAIL_ID, DETAIL_SSID, DETAIL_PRODUCT_NAME, DETAIL_COUNT, DETAIL_DDPRICE, DD_PRODUCT_ID, ORDER_SSID, ADDRESS_ID, DD_USER_ID, DETAIL_CREATEDATE
mapper.insert:
select DD_DETAIL_ID_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into DANGDANG_ORDER_DETAIL (DETAIL_ID, DETAIL_SSID, DETAIL_PRODUCT_NAME, DETAIL_COUNT, DETAIL_DDPRICE, DD_PRODUCT_ID, ORDER_SSID, ADDRESS_ID, DD_USER_ID, DETAIL_CREATEDATE) values (#{detailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{detailSsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailProductName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{detailDdprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ddProductId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderSsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ddUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{detailCreatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

INTO DANGDANG_ORDER_DETAIL ( DETAIL_ID, DETAIL_SSID, DETAIL_PRODUCT_NAME, DETAIL_COUNT, DETAIL_DDPRICE, DD_PRODUCT_ID, ORDER_SSID, ADDRESS_ID, DD_USER_ID )VALUES( DD_DETAIL_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{element.detailSsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.detailProductName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.detailCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{element.detailDdprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{element.ddProductId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{element.orderSsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{element.addressId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{element.ddUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
